me.prettyprint.hom
Class KeyConcatenationDelimiterStrategyImpl

java.lang.Object
  me.prettyprint.hom.KeyConcatenationDelimiterStrategyImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyConcatenationStrategy
public class KeyConcatenationDelimiterStrategyImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements KeyConcatenationStrategy

Keys in Cassandra cannot inherently be multi-field, so a strategy must be employed to concatenate fields together.

This strategy uses a delimiter to segment the fields. By default the delimiter is 2 pipes, ||, but can be overriden by calling setDelimiter(byte[]).

Author:
B. Todd Burruss
